scriptNote.p: Carolingian minuscule from Fleury (s. Homburgeg and Mittenhuber).

history.provenance: The manuscripts was probably in Fleury - a manuscript with the title "Lucani bellum civile" is listed in the catalogue from 1552.
Belonged to Pierre Daniel (1530-1603), Jacques Bongars and Jakob Graviseth (see exlibris from all three on f. 1r); the latter donated it to the Burgerbibliothek in Bern.
